lead_paragraph: Russia's sports ministry said on Monday it was "certain" about the transparency of its doping controls during the 2014 Winter Olympics in Sochi, and that independent observers had managed the testing operation daily.

headline.print_headline: Russia Defends Transparency of Sochi Doping Controls
headline.main: Russia Defends Transparency of Sochi Doping Controls
